concept.title: PGI 237.102-74 Taxonomy for the acquisition of services and supplies & equipment.

conbody.p: Click here for OUSD(AT&L) DPAP memorandum, “Taxonomy for the Acquisition of Services and Supplies & Equipment,” dated August 27, 2012. An Excel version of “Acquisition of Services and Supplies & Equipment Taxonomy” is available here.
